products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow Electric Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £151.50 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The warm, golden hues of this electric roller blind will definitely catch the eye! Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow blind is the ideal way to add a splash of colour to your favourite room. With a fabulously modern geometrical leaf design outlined in white, it’s a cheerful window dressing that will stand the test of time. Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1976 Fabric Colour: Summer Yellow Material: 3 Ply Vinyl, 1 Ply Fibreglass Lining: Pattern Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Willow Blackout Brazen Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Willow Blackout Brazen Yellow Electric Roller Blind in White/Yellow/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £158.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Add a delicate touch of decoration to your windows and complement a modern scheme with this print of willow branches in soft grey and yellow tones. The Willow Brazen Yellow Blackout Electric Roller Blind will have a positive and peaceful effect on a space thanks to the soothing design and blackout fabric. The electric aspect of this model ensures a swift and easy operation whenever you need to adjust the blind.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1966 Fabric Colour: Brazen Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Lining: White Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
